1: I joyfully sing a new song to the world.
2: I celebrate and share my joy in salvation each day.
3: I share his greatness and wonders with everyone around me.
4: I praise the greatness that inspires awe and respect.
5: I celebrate the creator of the heavens.
6: I find strength and beauty in my surroundings.
7: I honor the divine with my strength and gratitude.
8: I honor greatness and joyfully present my offerings.
9: I celebrate the beauty of holiness all around me.
10: The world is stable, and justice prevails everywhere.
11: I celebrate the joy of nature all around me.
12: The field and all its trees celebrate in joy.
13: He brings justice and truth to the world.
